mutants.original_line: if not s or not t:
mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.strip()
    t = t.strip()
    s = s.lower()
    t = t.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalpha()))
    t = ''.join((ch for ch in t if ch.isalpha()))
    if not s and (not t):
        return False
    sorted_s = sorted(s)
    sorted_t = sorted(t)
    if sorted_s == sorted_t:
        return True
    else:
        return False

def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.strip()
    t = t.strip()
    s = s.lower()
    t = t.lower()
    s = ''.join((ch for ch in s if ch.isalpha()))
    t = 'MUTATED'.join((ch for ch in t if ch.isalpha()))
    if not s or not t:
        return False
    sorted_s = sorted(s)
    sorted_t = sorted(t)
    if sorted_s == sorted_t:
        return True
    else:
        return False
